RT krinza.eth at ethDubai (🧱, 🚀) Y'all👀we set!! Wouldn't have happened if it wasn't for our sponsors at @SpheronHQ and @NervosNetwork
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Going into the final stretch of @ETHDubaiConf by taking over Dubai’s D3 Design District @onelifedxb 🎉 Dates are confirmed, the venue is set 🙌 Can't wait to treat the @developer_dao community to a fun lunch on 28th and meet our good sponsors @NervosNetwork and @SpheronHQ.
